entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
